about_the_game:
Appa is a linear narrative focused strategic card game.

Gameplay: Appa is a unique turn based strategy where you and your opponent both choose a card at the same time trying to predict the moves of the other.

Choose from a set of 35+ Cards with 10+ Synergizers combo. Ranging from normal attacks to card that change the meta of the game itself.

Customize your cards with fun Synergizers and blow your opponent away with a cascading domino effects in a satisfying game of push and pull.

A dreamlike drama about grief and death: Join Varun and Arundhati as they process and deal with the death of their father. Having received a letter from their death before his passing. They start getting constant nightmares where they face their emotions and play a card game with him.

A blend of Comics and Cinema: The story is told through a unique blend of 2d hand crafted cinematics and graphic novel Style as the two siblings navigate their grief, reconcile with their past and mend their relationship

content_descriptors.notes: *Spoiler alert* Both the two main characters of the game, are dealing with the death of their father, their grief turn them suicidal tendencies and close to self harm. the father in the end is revealed to have commited suicide.
